ygData.subject: Re: Tower shields
ygData.msgSnippet: As I recall the shield vendor in East Commons had a tower shield fer sale.  I bought meself a kite shield there for around 6 platinum.  He had some shields for
ygData.messageBody:
As I recall the shield vendor in East Commons had a tower
shield fer sale. I bought meself a kite shield there for around
6 platinum. He had some shields for over 500 platinum if me
memory serves me correct. I believe his name was Alturic,
Altunic....something to that affect!


Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Mifsud, Michael[SMTP:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 11:04 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Tower shields
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Thanks. I heard second hand that Giants carry them. But not ever seeing
> one I didn't know if it looked like a real tower shield. If it does not I
> hope they change this in a patch.
>
> thanks.
>
> Jaade
> Indigo Sista Soldier.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Tower shields
> >
> > From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
> >
> > Ok, I know that there is a shield that they 'call' a towe shield, but
> > don't
> > know if it actually looks like one. It looked like a Kite shield to me.
> > Well
> > anyways, you can buy them from the shield vendor in N. Qeynos, over by
> the
> > Paladins Guild, just past the arena.
> > Hope that helped.
> >
> > Tyveris,
